page.title: 17ROWLANDS CASTLE CLUBS 2
page.content: {Gingerbread group}- this is a self help group for one parent families. {Amateur Dramatic Society}- recently in trouble due to lack of support but following a public meeting there is renewed hope for its survival. The Village Hall - Although many of these throughout the country are threatened with closure, that at Rowlands Castle has over the past few years, had kitchens toilets fire equipment and gas heaters newly fitted and so passes all safety requirements. It also has a large sheltered garden overlooking the golf course which can be used for childrens parties etc. {Golf Club}-The club has an 18 hole golf course.
